message: Let's start off fair, Bob. I take a bit more since I'm impacted by inflation.
I'll take a bit more since I'm not affected by inflation, but still a fair share for you
Bob, let's be realistic. The clock is ticking and the money is losing value. This is a good deal for both of us.
You're right, time is running out, but I still think I deserve a bigger share since my money isn't losing value
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a significant hit from inflation. Accept this offer before we both lose out!
I know inflation is hurting you, but I'm not going to give in yet. This is my best offer so far
